channel.title: R.i.p
channel.description:
It's really funny and sad at the same time, 2 days ago some girl of my school jumped under a train and killed herself, she was funny looking and everyone of my 2nd school (I'm at my 4th now) always looked at her, whispering her name, calling her names out loud, people called her fish.
Now that she died, all the people are like, we didn't know each other but you seemed like a nice person, R.I.P. and stuff like that, they all became her friend AFTER she died. It's just sad.

item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:63, topic:443693”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=546371.msg4007123#msg4007123 date=1338762962]

i cried

Don’t cry for the idiots who think suicide ends all your problems.

When you’re dead you have no problems, the world that comes afterwards is no concern of yours.

No living man knows what happens after death… maybe something worst then life… WHO knws?

The brain ceases to function, so you have no thought process, feelings, anything. Your lifeless corpse then decomposes.

and apparently you don’t understand what I’m talking about.
[/quote]
I don’t think you understand what you’re talking about either.[/quote]
r duh… trya 2 be da smarty?

Read full topic

item.title: R.i.p
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:49, topic:443693”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=546371.msg4006660#msg4006660 date=1338728473]
Imagine how many people you would hurt if you ended your life right now.
[/quote]
I have, every day during school.

And you keep referring to it as “the easy way out”. It’s not easy. You have to consider everything your leaving behind. For you, if your god is loving and just as the bible claims he is, then he would see you’ve (probably) lived a good life and have done great things, and would welcome you into heaven. For me, I see it as once I’m gone, I’m gone. I’ve left my only chance of living, or being anything, because there was some kind of pain and suffering that I couldn’t cope with, be it a mental disorder that makes me think I’m not worth living, a tragic event, etc. Most of the time, it’s never easy.[/quote]
That’s not how god works, “if your god is loving and just as the bible claims he is, then he would see you’ve (probably) lived a good life and have done great things, and would welcome you into heaven.” You can kill 11000 people and still go to heaven lol. Now that’s a God of justice.

Read full topic
